title: Inspire Me: Top tips for shooting street style photography with Tomas Milinavicius
description: Inspire Me: Top tips for shooting street style photography with Tomas Milinavicius

components.copy: Inspire Me: Top tips for shooting street style photography with Tomas Milinavicius

text: Photographer Tomas Milinavicius shares his top tips for shooting street style photography using the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3. When he’s out shooting photography in the streets, there are things he’s always keeping an eye out for to get those crisp looking shots – from symmetry to capturing imagery from different perspectives. Checkout his tips to feel inspired!
